draftPicks.description: The Anaheim Ducks have acquired defenseman Brian Dumoulin from the Seattle Kraken in exchange for a fourth-round pick in the 2026 NHL Draft.

conditions: Anaheim will receive the earlier of Detroit’s own fourth-round pick in 2025 or Boston’s fourth-round pick in 2025 (previously acquired by Detroit March 2, 2023)
